conclusion: Analyze the circuit and graph to determine electromotive force and internal resistance.
Circuit with power supply, fixed resistors R1 and R2, variable resistor R3, capacitor C, sliding contact P, and graph of voltage U versus current I with points A and B.
Identify fixed resistor R1 as 50 Ohms.
Use graph at point A: U = 4V, I = 0.2A, calculate R2 = 20 Ohms.
Calculate total resistance at point A: R_total = 20 Ohms.
Determine R3 at point A: R3 = 0 Ohms.
At point B, R3 changes, R_total = 40 Ohms, calculate R3 = 20 Ohms.
Calculate electromotive force E = 4V and internal resistance r = 4 Ohms using graph.
Electromotive force and internal resistance of power supply are 4V and 4 Ohms.
